resources.string: We are filled with the Spirit by faith, enabling us to experience intimacy with God and enjoy all He has for us.
YOU CAN EXPRESS YOUR ATTITUDE TOWARDS GOD THROUGH PRAYER.
Prayer is simply talking with God.

Growing | Frustrated
Disappointing | Fulfilled
Forgiven | Stuck | Struggling
Joyful | Defeated | Exciting
Up and Down | Empty
Discouraged | Duty
Intimate | Mediocre
Painful | Dynamic | Guilty
Vital | So-so | Others?
GOD LOVES YOU AND OFFERS A WONDERFUL PLAN FOR YOUR LIFE.
